item.title: Life Update: Academia and the Workforce
item.description: So, I’ve had a few life events in the past few months, that will shape the way my future looks. That’s without counting the global pandemic happening around the world right now. Academia After graduating from my undergraduate program, I recieved an acceptance to Carleton Universities M.Asc program in Electrical and Computer Engineering. I will be starting my masters degree in the fall of 2020 and will be supervised by Professor James Green.
